descriptionHtml:
============
DESCRIPTION
============
This mod change Stenvar
I hope you like it
[color=red] To fix neck-seam , click on Stenvar and write in console \"setnpcweight 100\" save and exit game. And start playing again [/color]

===========
REQUIRED
===========
ApachiiSkyHair Male 1.0


=============
RECOMMENDED
=============
HighResMaps by Geonox


=============
INSTALLATION 
=============
Setup all files to your data folder


=============
UNINSTALLATION
=============
Delete bsa and esp files


=============

CREDITS:
Apachii for Apachii Sky Hair used in this mod
author: Den987
